member.name: P:Compression.BSA.IBSAReader.Files
member.summary: The files defined by the archive

member.name: P:Compression.BSA.IFile.Path
member.summary: The path of the file inside the archive

member.name: P:Compression.BSA.IFile.State
member.summary: Get the metadata for the file.

member.name: M:Compression.BSA.IFile.CopyDataTo(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Copies this entry to the given stream. 100% thread safe, the .bsa will be opened multiple times in order to maintain thread-safe access.

member.name: M:Compression.BSA.BSAUtils.ToBZString(Wabbajack.Common.RelativePath,Compression.BSA.VersionType)

member.name: M:Compression.BSA.BSAUtils.ToTermString(System.String,Compression.BSA.VersionType)
